I Got Distracted

Ramblings of a geeky homeschooling dad

Talk about getting distracted!

17 May 2014

I decided to start this blog/site because I have several ideas I want to write about before I get distracted by something else and forget them. I then proceeded to spend the rest of the day getting distracted by learning about Jekyll, the software that I'm using to create the site. Sigh... Well, at least it was educational.

This page was generated by GitHub Pages and Jekyll using the Architect Theme which is maintained by jasonlong and adapted for Jekyll by pietromenna.
